purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025), scheduled for June 10-13, 2025, in Paris, France. It highlights the early registration deadline of May 27, 2025, and provides details about the conference program, including tutorials, workshops, and social events. The email encourages attendees to register early to benefit from discounted fees and outlines the various activities planned for the conference.
evidence_sentences: 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025)
Register now: discounted fees until May 27!
The conference schedule comprises keynote and invited talks, a journal track, an industrial track, a work-in-progress track, a vendor exhibition, parallel tutorials, and satellite workshops.
The 2025 edition of the conference continues a number of important innovations started in previous years.

Extensive information on AEiC 2025 will be on the conference website, such as an overview of the program, the list of accepted papers and presentations, and descriptions of workshops, tutorials, keynote and invited presentations, and social events.
